data.title: GTI Announces Alliance with Documentum to Offer Enterprise Content Management Solutions
data.text:
TI Announces Alliance with Documentum to Offer Enterprise Content Management Solutions

(HONG KONG - 16 April 2004) Global Technology Integrator Limited (GTI), the premier IT solutions integrator in Greater China, is pleased to announce that it has signed a reseller agreement with Documentum, the leader in Enterprise Content Management (ECM). The two companies will jointly market enterprise content management solutions for North Asian customers.

The Documentum ECM platform enables companies to create, manage, deliver and archive large volumes of any type of content (documents, Web pages, XML files, rich media and fixed content) within and beyond the enterprise, helping global organizations to automate business processes and drive enterprise-wide efficiencies.

"Working with the Documentum ECM platform, GTI is providing its customers with the industry's most scalable and robust solution for managing unstructured content, fixed content and all other content types," said Wahab Yusoff, Regional Director for South East Asia at Documentum. "Documentum resellers look to Documentum as providing the most flexible, content management platform for integrating content and business processes, helping them achieve quick deployments and rapid return on investment."

As part of this alliance, GTI will have the opportunity to sell other Documentum products, such as Documentum eRoom, a Web-based collaborative workplace that enables distributed teams to work together to accelerate and improve development and delivery of products and services; optimize collaborative business processes; and improve innovation, problem-solving and decision-making.

"Documentum is an exceptional business partner and we are pleased to jointly enable Global 2000 companies to make the most of their content assets and existing IT infrastructure," said GTI Director, Connie Tse. "By incorporating Documentum's technology into GTI's suite of solution offering, we are delivering on our commitment to provide the most complete enterprise content management solution to our customers."

About Documentum

Documentum, a division of EMC Corporation, provides enterprise content management (ECM) solutions that enable organizations to unite teams, content and associated business processes. With a single platform, Documentum enables people to collaboratively create, manage, deliver and archive the content that drives business operations, from documents and discussions to email, Web pages, records and rich media. For more information, visit Documentum on the Web at http://www.documentum-sea.com.

About Global Technology Integrator Limited

Global Technology Integrator Limited (GTI) is the leading IT solutions integrator throughout Greater China, delivers inspiring IT solutions and professional services to various industries and government over 10 years. Founded in 1989, GTI keeps abreast with the evolution of technologies and business modeling to respond to market swiftly by partnering with global technologies vendors, insightful solutions and delicate services. Please visit http://www.gti.com.hk to learn more about GTI.
